"-" "_")) "value" $doc) -}} {{- end -}} {{- else -}} {{- $subject_map = partial "util/map_set" (dict "data" $subject_map "keys" (slice $version (replace (anchorize $doc.Params.subjects) "-" "_")) "value" $doc) -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- return $subject_map -}}
